param.name: ARTIFACTORY_BUILD_NAME
param.spec: text description='Artifactory Build Name to promote.' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTORY_BUILD_NUMBER
param.spec: text description='Artifactory Build Number to promote.' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTORY_TARGET_STATUS
param.spec: text description='Artifactory status to promote build to.' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: ARTIFACTORY_TARGET_REPOSITORY
param.spec: text description='Artifactory repository to promote build to.' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'
